Disease.content: You are a helpful assistant who is good at identifying named entities and their relations.

Paragraph: Thirty - nine of the mutations - including 34 small mutations , 2 large structural alterations , and hypermethylation in 3 tumors - were not detected in the corresponding peripheral blood DNA .
